content: **brea button cowl** ======================================= **pattern includes a full video tutorial ** this cozy cowl is the perfect accessory for fall and winter its flat construction and buttons mean that it can be wrapped up nice and tight - no wind chills with this cowl the pattern features a meditative one-row repeat using basic crochet stitches so it s an absolutely perfect make for a relaxing night in use your favorite buttons to show off your own unique personality and style **materials** yarn lion brand heartland 1 hook 6mm j-10 tunisian crochet hook 2 --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 3 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2025 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //shrsl com/3hjms 2 https //shrsl com/4i721 3 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
